body: @htuch : Commit 8bf7666 closes the loop on my comment in envoyproxy/envoy#2444 as the constructors from grpc_slice are now marked deprecated. This PR won't land for a while, but we will make sure that non-preferred members are marked clearly.

@vjpai can we get some direct conversion from `grpc::ByteBuffer` to and from `google::protobuf::Message` that doesn't rely on templating? This would make some of the hacky stuff I did in https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/pull/2444 go away.
